title: Damian Lillard, Sixers Sadness, and What to Do With Denver | Group Chat
description:
Justin, Rob, and Jonathan talk about bubble MVP Damian Lillard (01:25). Chris Ryan joins to discuss the downer of a time the 76ers are having and how improvements by other players could affect Ben Simmons’s performance (27:20). Later they dive into nerd corner to talk about the Denver Nuggets’ growth and what makes Michael Porter Jr. one of the breakout stars of the bubble (50:52).

Hosts: Justin Verrier, Rob Mahoney, Jonathan Tjarks

Guest: Chris Ryan
